goal: Add monsters for 3 dungeon themes (crypt, cave, bandit lair) using factory functions with shared actions and conditions

#447: Targeting Strategies - Closest, Lowest HP, Lowest AC
#448: Monster Conditions - Pack Tactics, Undead Fortitude, Vulnerability/Immunity
#449: Monster Factories - 9 monsters for dungeon themes
